Why Host?

Horizon allows members of your trusted communities (academic, professional, social, service, religious) to see that you are open to hosting them on their next visit to your beloved city, and you a way to efficiently screen requests for accommodation. We give you the control to indicate which communities you trust.

Why host with Horizon?

  • Enable friends, family, and community members to discover you have a listing on AirBnB (or other vacation rental websites)
  • Rent your room, couch or apartment to someone from your existing trusted network
  • Avoid dealing with inquires from strangers
  • Live with a potential roommate (for a fee) for a few weeks before deciding on whether they are a long term fit
  • Be the "change you want to see in the world", by raising money for your favorite charity

Other Benefits of Hosting

  • "Travel" from the comfort of your own home
  • Have rich social experiences
  • Network with like minded individuals
  • Help your friends and community members afford to explore the world
  • Unlock the magic of your city to out of towners

We hope you agree increasing access to travel opportunities matters.
